==== t3.ts (0 errors) ====
    import a = require("./t1");
    a.default;
    import b from "./t1";
    b;
    import * as c from "./t1";
    c.default;
    import { default as d } from "./t1";
    d;
    import e1, * as e2 from "./t1";
    e1;
    e2.default;
    import f1, { default as f2 } from "./t1";
    f1;
    f2;
    export { a, b, c, d, e1, e2, f1, f2 };

==== t2.ts (0 errors) ====
    import a = require("./t1");
    a.default;
    import b from "./t1";
    b;
    import * as c from "./t1";
    c.default;
    import { default as d } from "./t1";
    d;
    import e1, * as e2 from "./t1";
    e1;
    e2.default;
    import f1, { default as f2 } from "./t1";

    f2;
